intro: Push the pushbutton to start and stop the fan

build.steps: Place the motor, pushbutton and a 220ohm resistor on the breadboard

steps: 1. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to the positive rail of the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from positive rail to the pushbutton
3. Connect a jumper wire from GND to the negative rail of the breadboard
4. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to one side of the resistor
5. Connect a jumper wire from D2 to one side of the resistor
1. Connect a jumper wire from D10 to the positive pin of the motor
2. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative pin of the motor
3. Run the Project and then go to the Play Section
